Khalifa, 29, shared oodles of snaps from the bash on his Instagram account while Rose, 33, chronicled the dayâ€™s events in her Instagram stories. 
â€œWe love Sebastian. Heâ€™s our beautiful child . Heâ€™s super awesome,â€ Rose said in a speech to the party-goers as she and Khalifa toasted their son. â€œHappy birthday, pumpkin.â€ 
Sebastian then has the honor of blowing out the candles on a three-tiered, colorful PJ Masks -themed cake. Kevin Wong A post shared by Amber Rose (@amberrose) on Feb 20, 2017 at 3:20pm PST A post shared by Amber Rose (@amberrose) on Feb 20, 2017 at 11:40am PST A post shared by (@amberrosesnaps) on Feb 19, 2017 at 4:49pm PST 
Aside from digging into his cake â€” and opening mounds of gifts, of course â€” Sebastian danced to songs like Pharrell Williams â€˜â€œHappyâ€ and â€œWatch Me (Whip/Nae Nae),â€ even serenading the crowd with his too-cute rendition of â€œJingle Bell Rock.â€ Because when itâ€™s your birthday, Christmas songs are allowed even in the off season. 
As evidenced by Roseâ€™s Instagram stories and snaps, the celebration also included balloons, a swing set, a fog machine and appearances from Spider-Man and PJ Masks leader Catboy. Kevin Wong
